name: Keeper of the Light
title: Ezalor
lore: Ezalor is an ancient being, one of the Fundamentals. He is the keeper of light itself, wielding it against evil.

illuminate.name: Illuminate
illuminate.description: Channels a wave of light that damages enemies. Longer channel = more damage.

blindingLight.name: Blinding Light
blindingLight.description: Creates a burst of light that knocks back enemies and causes them to miss attacks.

chakraMagic.name: Chakra Magic
chakraMagic.description: Restores mana to a target ally and reduces their ability cooldowns.

spiritForm.name: Spirit Form
spiritForm.description: Transforms into spirit form, gaining Will-O-Wisp which creates a hypnotizing light.
